summary: Both REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be implemented in the diff. The footer tagline in Footer.tsx now reads exactly as specified, and ProfileSetupModal.tsx has been updated with functional email field, proper submission logic, query invalidation on success, and Layout.tsx controls modal visibility based on authentication and profile state.

hallucinated_features.description: A new backend migration module (backend/migration.mo) was added and integrated into backend/main.mo, introducing data migration logic for the backend canister.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention any backend migration, schema changes, or backend restructuring. This is a backend change not requested in either REQ-1 or REQ-2.
